function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"High infection rates and health complications","Mitigation":"Enhance public health measures and vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Digital contact tracing, vaccine distribution technology","People":"Global population","Owner":"Government and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of access to urban green spaces","Impact":"Reduced physical and mental well-being","Mitigation":"Expansion of urban green spaces, promotion of community engagement","Technologies":"Urban planning and design, community engagement platforms","People":"Urban residents","Owner":"City planners and local government"},{"Description":"Inadequate planning of residential areas","Impact":"Limited access to recreational areas and common green spaces","Mitigation":"Incorporation of green spaces in residential development planning","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis, urban planning software","People":"Residential communities","Owner":"Building developers and urban planners"}]}
